name: @pact-foundation/pact-standalone
description: Pact mock service and verifier wrapper package. Installing this will install an executable appropriate for your platform.
author: Matt Fellows <m@onegeek.com.au> (https://github.com/mefellows)

scripts.link: npm link ./dist/pact-standalone-osx/ && npm link ./dist/pact-standalone-win32/ && npm link ./dist/pact-standalone-linux-x86/ && npm link ./dist/pact-standalone-linux-x86_64/
scripts.unlink: npm unlink ./dist/pact-standalone-osx/ && npm unlink ./dist/pact-standalone-win32/ && npm unlink ./dist/pact-standalone-linux-ia32/ && npm unlink ./dist/pact-standalone-linux-x64/
